channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'Educators will be fired': Republicans cheer Trump order dismantling Education Department as Dems seethe
item.description: President Trump signed an executive order on Thursday to abolish the Department of Education and move critical functions to other entities.

item.title: A Tale of Two Deportation Cases
item.description: In the case of the Venezuelans, the DOJ is resisting the kind of meticulous review that it provided in Mahmoud Khalil’s case.

item.title: Wisconsin’s Susan Crawford Donated To Democrat Fundraising Giant Under Fire For Alleged Fraud
item.description: FEC records appear to show that Susan Crawford gave numerous small-dollar donations to ActBlue during her time as a private lawyer.

item.title: SCOTUS’ Refusal To Rein In Rogue Lower Courts Has Become A Disturbing Pattern
item.description: The Supreme Court has become a paper tiger, failing to hold defiant lower courts accountable when they make rogue decisions.

item.title: New York's top court blocks NYC from letting noncitizens vote

item.title: Americans finally got a rule protecting their credit scores from unexpected medical debt. Now Trump is attacking the agency behind it

item.title: SCOOP: House Republican moves to codify Trump order to dismantle Department of Education

item.title: Amid a grimmer outlook from the Fed, there’s a lone, mysterious holdout predicting stronger economic growth
item.description: The Fed’s consensus for GDP growth dropped from 2.1% to 1.7% after its latest round of economic forecasts published Wednesday.

item.title: Book Review: Buffett’s Early Investments
